CustomField.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL(Lecture__r.Session__r.Session_Type__c, "Career development session"), ISPICKVAL(Lecture__r.Session__r.Session_Type__c, "Case-based workshop"), ISPICKVAL(Lecture__r.Session__r.Session_Type__c, "Controversy"), ISPICKVAL(Lecture__r.Session__r.Session_Type__c, "Focused Workshop"), ISPICKVAL(Lecture__r.Session__r.Session_Type__c, "Hands-on Course"), ISPICKVAL(Lecture__r.Session__r.Session_Type__c, "Interactive Session"), ISPICKVAL(Lecture__r.Session__r.Session_Type__c, "Plenary Sysmposium"), ISPICKVAL(Lecture__r.Session__r.Session_Type__c, "Special Session"), ISPICKVAL(Lecture__r.Session__r.Session_Type__c, "Topical Symposium"), ISPICKVAL(Lecture__r.Session__r.Session_Type__c, "Symposia"), ISPICKVAL(Lecture__r.Session__r.Session_Type__c, "Teaching Course") )
CustomField.label: Eligible for Speaker Ticket
